Title: Pettable(?) Mak
Description:
[h3]Now with more petting responses, a greater aura of pettability, resistance to over-autostimulation, and an increased appetite![/h3]

With this mod, everyone's favourite seething mound of malachine spite is pettable!

[i]Should[/i] you pet him? Absolutely not!

Definitely not a second time, either! [i]No really. Don't.[/i]

[h3]Steps to pet Mak[/h3]
[olist][*]Approach Mak.
[*]Think about petting Mak.
[*]??????
[*]DON'T[/olist]

[h3]FAQ[/h3]
Q: Can I pet Mak with this mod enabled?
A: [i]Yes! but I can't imagine why you'd want to.[/i]

Q: Why did Mak tell me off when I petted him?
A: [i]Have you spoken to him? He's not a friendly frog.[/i]

Q: I petted him a second time, and [i]the thing[/i] happened :(
A: [i]Not a question, but he did warn you not to pet him again.[/i]

Q: Why did you make this mod??
A: [i]Good question![/i]

Q: Really, though, what happens the second time?
A: [spoiler]He swallows you whole, you become a cord in time's silly carpet, and your run ends.[/spoiler]

[spoiler]I'm not kidding[/spoiler]

[h2]Source[/h2]
Want to see how it's made? There's a [url=https://github.com/UnderDoug/UD_Pettable_Mak/]git repository[/url]!

Licence is the "Unlicence". I don't know what that means, but I also don't care what you do with it. Easy.
